channel.title: Velvet Revolver
channel.description:
Anyone else luuurv' velvet revolver?
For those that do not know, the band members consist of several former Guns n Roses members. Such as Slash, Duff McKagan, and Matt Sorum. The lead singer (Scott Weiland) was the lead singer for Stone Temple Pilots.
Here are some songs.
http://youtube.com/watch?v=YwJhQnt34m0 - She builds quick machines
http://youtube.com/watch?v=JvFnBdNhQ1E - The last fight
http://youtube.com/watch?v=iapJSsILcvE - Dirty little thing
http://youtube.com/watch?v=SkTIfvc_HI4 - Fall to pieces
http://youtube.com/watch?v=Vewm5l-i-yw - Slither

item.title: Velvet Revolver
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I’ve never listened to velvet revolver, and wont start, but just though I’d mention that 2 of my friends are going to see them live in about 3 days.

Read full topic

item.title: Velvet Revolver
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I haven’t heard them in awhile. Used to listen alot, still a Guns fan though so I might download a few albums some time.

Read full topic

item.title: Velvet Revolver
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

This is just Guns N Roses without AXL, and AXL his voice is great. Somehow I don’t really like VR.

In my opinion, axl is a complete prick and I don’t like him at all. I mean GnR was pretty awesome though. The new GnR is complete crap though. I’d way rather listen to VR over the new GnR.

[quote=“Casey., post:3, topic:192523”]I used to like them when I was like 10, I heard a song and thought it was the fucking sex.

Now I don’t really think much of them :/[/quote]

Yeah I used to think Slither was the coolest song ever made, but I stopped liking them again. But when they came out with the newest album I really like VR again

Read full topic

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I don’t really like them. It’s always been “girl rock” in my family (ie we all despise it and listen to real rock/metal instead ^^)
